input_args.passage: "the Taliban | the Taliban, The battle took place between November 25 and December 1, 2001, in northern Afghanistan. input_args.claim: "From, we learn that this battle was a part of the United States-led coalition forces' intervention to overthrow the Taliban's Islamic Emirate of Afghanistan."
